entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: W 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
